CHAPTER 20 ■Scientific Reasoning
The same problems which beset origin-of-life research also bedevil efforts to
show how virtually any complex biochemical system came about. Biochem-
istry has revealed a molecular world which stoutly resists explanation by the
same theory that has long been applied at the level of the whole organism. Nei-
